operations

Class ScaleElements

  • java.lang.Object
    • operations.ScaleElements

  • public class ScaleElements
extends java.lang.Object
    this method allows you to resize entire groups of objects or single objects
    Author:
    Liandri

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ScaleElements() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void scaleAll(javafx.scene.Group root, double factor)
      scale a group of 3D objects by a factor(double) you decide
      void scaleDownAll(javafx.scene.Group root)
      scale down all nodes in a 3D group by half (smaller)
      void scaleSingle(javafx.scene.Node node, double factor)
      scale a single node by a factor(double) you decide
      void scaleUpAll(javafx.scene.Group root)
      scale up all nodes in a 3D group by a factor of two(bigger)

      • scaleSingle

        public void scaleSingle(javafx.scene.Node node,
                        double factor)
        scale a single node by a factor(double) you decide
        Parameters:
        node - 3D object to change size of
        factor - double amount to change (0.1 very small)(1.0 same size) (2.0 twice the size)

      • scaleAll

        public void scaleAll(javafx.scene.Group root,
                     double factor)
        scale a group of 3D objects by a factor(double) you decide
        Parameters:
        root - group of 3D objects to change size of
        factor - double amount to change (0.1 very small)(1.0 same size) (2.0 twice the size)
